venue.name: St. Paul's Episcopal Church - Parish Hall

item.description:
There has been such enthusiasm for this group that we're expanding into Boston! Our first monthly meeting in Boston will be at St. Paul's Church, near the Common. Easy access by T and lots of nearby parking garages.

Bring your business card for a raffle! (Of course, bring extra cards to share with each other.)

Light snacks will be provided.

We will get together at 7 p.m. to socialize, then will hear a brief presentation by one of our members. This will be followed by more chances to meet and greet!

I hope that you will join us!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.why: We're a diverse group of women: different ages, careers, interests. We're ALL interesting, though! Come and meet positive women like yourself.
item.name: Women in Business Network - Boston Meeting
